abstract.p: Madison Square Garden president Dave Checketts reportedly has met with Edmonton Oilers' president and general manager Glen Sather regarding Rangers' vacancies (S)

block.p: According to a National Hockey League official, Madison Square Garden President Dave Checketts met with the Edmonton Oilers' president and general manager, Glen Sather, in Southern California last weekend regarding the Rangers' vacancies.
''I did?'' Sather said last night from his Palm Springs, Calif., residence. ''I told you guys a long time ago I'm not going to make any comments on my situation.''

According to a National Hockey League official, Madison Square Garden President Dave Checketts met with the Edmonton Oilers' president and general manager, Glen Sather, in Southern California last weekend regarding the Rangers' vacancies.
''I did?'' Sather said last night from his Palm Springs, Calif., residence. ''I told you guys a long time ago I'm not going to make any comments on my situation.''

Sather said he spent the weekend playing golf with Wayne Gretzky's agent, Mike Barnett, and a reporter from a Vancouver newspaper. ''It would have been pretty tough for me to have a meeting when I played golf with a reporter for two days and with an agent for two days,'' Sather said. ''That's all I've got to say about it.''
Checketts could not be reached for comment.
